brawlBox.description: Contains coins and up to 3 pins. May rarely drop bonus items such as a new brawler, trade credits, token doubler, or a new avatar.
dropsDescription: Coins drop: 120 - 180 (discrete uniform distribution)
Draw 1: Pin: 2/3, Brawler: 1/3
Draw 2: Pin: 1/2, Wild Card Pin: 1/4, Bonus Item: 1/4
Draw 3: Pin: 2/5, Nothing: 3/5
Probability of getting a specific rarity given a pin drop:
Common: 3/5, Rare: 1/4, Epic: 1/12, Legendary: 1/20, Custom: 1/60
When duplicate pins are available, the probability of receiving a duplicate is multiplied by a modifier to make it less likely to receive duplicates.
Modifiers by rarity: Common: 1/2, Rare: 3/5, Epic: 4/5, Legendary: 1, Custom: 1
Probability of getting a specific rarity given a wild card pin drop:
Common: 3/5, Rare: 1/4, Epic: 1/10, Legendary: 1/20, Custom: 0
Probability of getting a specific rarity given a brawler drop:
Trophy Road: 1/2, Rare: 1/4, Super Rare: 1/8, Epic: 1/16, Mythic: 1/32, Legendary: 1/64, Chromatic: 1/64
After all Epic and/or Mythic brawlers have been collected, there is a probability of receiving 1500 coins instead of a new brawler.
This probability starts at 1/61 and increases the more brawlers that have been collected.
Probability of getting a specific type of bonus item given a bonus item drop:
Trade Credits: 5/12, Token Doubler (+250): 1/3, New Avatar: 1/4
Probability of getting a specific amount of trade credits given a trade credits drop:
1 credit: 347/2000, 2 credits: 243/500, 3 credits: 6/25, 5 credits: 2/25, 10 credits: 1/50, 69 credits: 1/2000! (expected value is 2.5 credits)

pinPack.description: Guaranteed to contain 1 pin and a chance for up to 6 pins in total. Only contains pins but has a much higher chance to find pins of higher rarity.
dropsDescription: Coins drop: 0
Draw 1: Wild Card Pin: 1
Draws 2 to 6: Pin: 1/3, Nothing: 2/3
Probability of getting a specific rarity given a pin drop:
Common: 2/5, Rare: 3/10, Epic: 3/20, Legendary: 1/10, Custom: 1/20
When duplicate pins are available, the probability of receiving a duplicate is multiplied by a modifier to make it less likely to receive duplicates.
Modifiers by rarity: Common: 1/3, Rare: 1/2, Epic: 2/3, Legendary: 5/6, Custom: 1
Probability of getting a specific rarity given a wild card pin drop:
Common: 3/5, Rare: 1/4, Epic: 1/10, Legendary: 1/20, Custom: 0

megaBox.description: Drops many coins and has a very high chance of collecting at least 1 brawler. Can contain up to 6 pins, up to 3 brawlers, and sometimes bonus items. Does not contain any brawlers above Epic rarity or pins above Rare rarity.
dropsDescription: Coins drop: 4 drops * (120 - 180 per drop) (each drop is a discrete uniform distribution)
Draws 1 to 3: Pin: 1
Draw 4: Pin: 1/3, Brawler: 1/4, Bonus Item: 5/12
Draw 5: Pin: 1/2, Brawler: 1/2
Draw 6: Pin: 1/4, Brawler: 3/4
Probability of getting a specific rarity given a pin drop:
Common: 3/5, Rare: 2/5, Epic: 0, Legendary: 0, Custom: 0
When duplicate pins are available, the probability of receiving a duplicate is multiplied by a modifier to make it less likely to receive duplicates.
Modifiers by rarity: Common: 2/3, Rare: 3/4
Probability of getting a specific rarity given a brawler drop:
Trophy Road: 3/8, Rare: 1/4, Super Rare: 1/4, Epic: 1/8, Mythic: 0, Legendary: 0, Chromatic: 0
This probability starts at 1/61 and increases the more brawlers that have been collected.
Probability of getting a specific type of bonus item given a bonus item drop:
Trade Credits: 5/12, Token Doubler (+250): 1/3, New Avatar: 1/4
Probability of getting a specific amount of trade credits given a trade credits drop:
1 credit: 347/2000, 2 credits: 243/500, 3 credits: 6/25, 5 credits: 2/25, 10 credits: 1/50, 69 credits: 1/2000! (expected value is 2.5 credits)
